description:
Hot 8 Yoga is GROWING and that means we are expanding our management team!

Hot 8 Yoga is the Hottest. Cleanest. Most Connected hot yoga studio. We're looking for enthusiastic, growth-driven Directors and Assistant Directors who love Yoga to join our company.

Candidates must have a 200-hour RYT certificate and are required to teach classes on the schedule (Power, Power 1, Barre, Sculpt, Hot Power Fusion, Yin).

Benefits:

Previous management experience is required.

  • Hot 8 Yoga to pay 60% of Health, Dental and Vision insurance (up to $500)
  • 2-weeks (10 days) PTO
  • Free yoga, all day, everyday

Submit cover letter and resume for consideration!

Job Type: Full-time

Hourly $25 - $31 per hour.

Benefits:

  • 401(k)
  • Dental insurance
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Vision insurance

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Holidays
  • On call
  • Weekend availability

Supplemental Pay Types:

  • Commission Pay

Work Location: One location

Responsibilities Include:

  • Interviewing, hiring and training teachers and front desk staff
  • Working a minimum of 40 in-studio hours per week
  • Being present at the studio during peak business hours (evenings and weekends)
  • Tracking studio budget
  • Addressing day-to-day maintenance needs
  • Processing payroll
  • Oversee inventory
  • Work 4-5 Front Desk shifts
  • Lots of cleaning - all day every day!
  • Lead Teacher Trainings
  • Lead and manager teachers and front desk staff
